pages.text: You have come a long way and nothing could stop you. Except for the few times in Ocean Temples with mining fatigue, slowness, mining underwater, in the air and other adverse conditions...\\_Hm, written out like this, that was a bit more than expected_.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Prevents mining speed slowdowns (on tools) or movement slowdowns (on chestplates).\\Max Level: 1\Applicable to mining tools and chestplates.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Inexorable by surrounding your [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) and the other required materials.
